typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		step as string,
		type as string,
		amount as integer '###,###',
		nameOrig as string,
		oldbalanceOrg as integer '###,###',
		newbalanceOrig as integer '###,###',
		nameDest as string,
		oldbalanceDest as integer '###,###',
		newbalanceDest as integer '###,###',
		isFraud as boolean,
		isFlaggedFraud as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		step
	)) ~> source
source sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	filePattern:'staging_file[n]',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink
